input: As a customer, I want to have the option to enroll in paperless billing to receive my invoices electronically, reducing paper waste and promoting environmental sustainability.
output: Scrum User Story: Paperless Billing Enrollment Description: As a customer, I want to have the option to enroll in paperless billing to receive my invoices electronically, reducing paper waste and promoting environmental sustainability. Acceptance Criteria: Customers should have the option to enroll in paperless billing within their account settings. Paperless billing should be the default option, but customers can choose to receive paper invoices if preferred. Scenario: Enrolling in Paperless Billing Given that I am a customer When I access my account settings And I want to enroll in paperless billing for environmental reasons Then I should have the option to select paperless billing as my preferred billing method Scenario: Receiving Electronic Invoices Given that I am a customer enrolled in paperless billing When I am due to receive an invoice for my security services Then the invoice should be delivered to me electronically, reducing the need for paper invoices Scenario: Opting Out of Paperless Billing Given that I am a customer enrolled in paperless billing When I want to opt out of paperless billing and receive paper invoices instead And I access my account settings Then I should have the option to switch back to receiving paper invoices Scenario: Notification of Billing Method Changes Given that I am a customer who has changed my billing method from paperless to paper invoices When I make this change in my account settings Then I should receive a notification confirming the change in my billing method

input: As a customer, I want to receive alerts and notifications for overdue payments, helping me stay informed and avoid service interruptions.
output: Scrum User Story: Overdue Payment Notifications Description: As a customer, I want to receive alerts and notifications for overdue payments, helping me stay informed and avoid service interruptions. input: As a customer, I want to have the option to split my payments into multiple installments for larger bills, providing flexibility and ease of managing my finances.
output: Scrum User Story: Split Payments for Larger Bills Description: As a customer, I want to have the option to split my payments into multiple installments for larger bills, providing flexibility and ease of managing my finances. input: As a customer, I want to be able to dispute and request a review of any billing discrepancies or inaccuracies, ensuring that my bills are correct and charges are valid.
output: Scrum User Story: Billing Dispute Resolution Description: As a customer, I want to be able to dispute and request a review of any billing discrepancies or inaccuracies, ensuring that my bills are correct and charges are valid. input: As a customer, I want the option to set up automatic payment reminders to ensure I never miss a payment and avoid late fees.

Scenario: Setting Up Automatic Payment Reminders Given that I am a customer making payments When I want to set up automatic payment reminders to avoid missing payments And I access my account settings Then I should be able to configure the timing and frequency of payment reminders Scenario: Receiving Automatic Payment Reminders Given that I am a customer with automatic payment reminders set up When the configured timing for a payment reminder is reached Then I should receive an automatic payment reminder notification And the reminder should include details of the upcoming payment Scenario: Customizing Payment Reminder Preferences Given that I am a customer with automatic payment reminders set up When I want to customize the timing and frequency of payment reminders And I access my account settings Then I should be able to modify my payment reminder preferences to better suit my needs Scenario: Acknowledging Payment Reminders Given that I am a customer who has received an automatic payment reminder When I acknowledge the reminder and complete the payment Then I should have the option to mark the payment as completed within the reminder notification</s>

input: As a customer, I want to be able to request a payment extension or arrangement if I am unable to make a payment on the scheduled due date, helping me avoid late fees and service interruptions.
output: Scrum User Story: Payment Extension Requests Description: As a customer, I want to be able to request a payment extension or arrangement if I am unable to make a payment on the scheduled due date, helping me avoid late fees and service interruptions. Acceptance Criteria: Customers should have access to a payment extension request feature. Payment extension requests should be submitted with an explanation of the need for the extension. Customers should receive a response and confirmation of the payment extension within a reasonable timeframe. Scenario: Requesting a Payment Extension Given that I am a customer unable to make a payment on the due date When I want to request a payment extension And I access the payment extension request feature Then I should be able to submit my request along with an explanation for the extension Scenario: Confirmation of Extension Request Given that I am a customer who has submitted a payment extension request When my request is received by the billing department Then I should receive confirmation that my request has been received and is being reviewed Scenario: Providing Additional Information for Extension Given that I am a customer with a pending payment extension request When the billing department requests additional information or documentation for the extension And I provide the requested information Then my payment extension request should continue to be reviewed with the additional details provided Scenario: Payment Extension Confirmation Given that I am a customer with a pending payment extension request When the billing department completes the review process Then I should receive a response confirming the approval or denial of the payment extension request And if the extension is approved, the new due date should be specified

Acceptance Criteria: Customers should have access to a payment extension request feature. Payment extension requests should be submitted with an explanation of the need for the extension. Customers should receive a response and confirmation of the payment extension within a reasonable timeframe. Scenario: Requesting a Payment Extension Given that I am a customer unable to make a payment on the due date When I want to request a payment extension And I access the payment extension request feature Then I should be able to submit my request along with an explanation for the extension Scenario: Confirmation of Extension Request Given that I am a customer who has submitted a payment extension request When my request is received by the billing department Then I should receive confirmation that my request has been received and is being reviewed Scenario: Providing Additional Information for Extension Given that I am a customer with a pending payment extension request When the billing department requests additional information or documentation for the extension And I provide the requested information Then my payment extension request should continue to be reviewed with the additional details provided Scenario: Payment Extension Confirmation Given that I am a customer with a pending payment extension request When the billing department completes the review process Then I should receive a response confirming the approval or denial of the payment extension request And if the extension is approved, the new due date should be specified</s>

input: As a customer, I want to have the ability to review and dispute any late fees that may have been applied to my account, ensuring fairness in billing.
output: Scrum User Story: Late Fee Dispute Description: As a customer, I want to have the ability to review and dispute any late fees that may have been applied to my account, ensuring fairness in billing. Acceptance Criteria: Customers should have access to a late fee dispute resolution process. Disputes should be submitted with details of the late fee charge. Customers should receive a response and resolution within a reasonable timeframe. Scenario: Reviewing Late Fees Given that I am a customer with assessed late fees When I want to review the late fees applied to my account And I access the late fee review process Then I should be able to see details of the late fee charges Scenario: Initiating a Late Fee Dispute Given that I am a customer with late fees to dispute When I want to dispute a late fee charge on my account And I access the late fee dispute resolution process Then I should be able to submit my dispute along with details of the late fee charge Scenario: Review and Resolution Process Given that I am a customer who has submitted a late fee dispute When my dispute is received by the billing department Then the dispute should undergo a review process, and I should receive acknowledgment of the dispute submission Scenario: Late Fee Dispute Outcome Given that I am a customer with a disputed late fee charge When the billing department completes the review process Then I should receive a response informing me of the resolution of the dispute And if the dispute is valid, the late fee should be adjusted accordingly

Acceptance Criteria: Customers should have access to a late fee dispute resolution process. Disputes should be submitted with details of the late fee charge. Customers should receive a response and resolution within a reasonable timeframe. Scenario: Reviewing Late Fees Given that I am a customer with assessed late fees When I want to review the late fees applied to my account And I access the late fee review process Then I should be able to see details of the late fee charges Scenario: Initiating a Late Fee Dispute Given that I am a customer with late fees to dispute When I want to dispute a late fee charge on my account And I access the late fee dispute resolution process Then I should be able to submit my dispute along with details of the late fee charge Scenario: Review and Resolution Process Given that I am a customer who has submitted a late fee dispute When my dispute is received by the billing department Then the dispute should undergo a review process, and I should receive acknowledgment of the dispute submission Scenario: Late Fee Dispute Outcome Given that I am a customer with a disputed late fee charge When the billing department completes the review process Then I should receive a response informing me of the resolution of the dispute And if the dispute is valid, the late fee should be adjusted accordingly</s>

input: As a customer, I want the option to receive billing notifications and alerts through SMS or text messages for convenient and timely updates on my account.
output: Scrum User Story: SMS Billing Notifications Description: As a customer, I want the option to receive billing notifications and alerts through SMS or text messages for convenient and timely updates on my account. Acceptance Criteria: Customers should have the option to select SMS or text message notifications for billing updates. Billing notifications sent via SMS should include important information and instructions. input: As a customer, I want to have the option to receive billing notifications and alerts through push notifications on the mobile app, providing real-time updates on my account.
output: Scrum User Story: Mobile App Billing Notifications Description: As a customer, I want to have the option to receive billing notifications and alerts through push notifications on the mobile app, providing real-time updates on my account. Push notifications should provide real-time information and instructions related to billing. input: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to recognize familiar faces and identify potential intruders.
output: Scrum User Story: Facial Recognition Security Description: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to recognize familiar faces and identify potential intruders. This will enhance security by allowing the system to differentiate between known individuals and potential threats. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support facial recognition using AI technology. Customers should be able to enroll known individuals' faces in the system. The system should send alerts if an unrecognized face is detected during a security event. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enrolling Known Faces Given that I am a customer When I access the facial recognition settings And I want to enroll a known individual's face Then I should be able to add their face to the system's database Scenario: Recognizing Known Faces Given that I am a customer with enrolled faces When the security system detects a known individual's face Then it should not trigger an alert and should identify the person Scenario: Alert for Unrecognized Faces Given that I am a customer with enrolled faces When the security system detects an unrecognized face during a security event Then it should trigger an alert and notify me Scenario: Managing Enrolled Faces Given that I am a customer with enrolled faces When I access the facial recognition settings And I want to manage the list of enrolled faces Then I should be able to add, edit, or remove faces from the system
text: <s>[INST]Provide a Scrum user story formatted with Gherkin structure with 4 scenarios for: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to recognize familiar faces and identify potential intruders.[/INST]Scrum User Story: Facial Recognition Security Description: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to recognize familiar faces and identify potential intruders. This will enhance security by allowing the system to differentiate between known individuals and potential threats. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support facial recognition using AI technology. Customers should be able to enroll known individuals' faces in the system. The system should send alerts if an unrecognized face is detected during a security event. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enrolling Known Faces Given that I am a customer When I access the facial recognition settings And I want to enroll a known individual's face Then I should be able to add their face to the system's database Scenario: Recognizing Known Faces Given that I am a customer with enrolled faces When the security system detects a known individual's face Then it should not trigger an alert and should identify the person Scenario: Alert for Unrecognized Faces Given that I am a customer with enrolled faces When the security system detects an unrecognized face during a security event Then it should trigger an alert and notify me Scenario: Managing Enrolled Faces Given that I am a customer with enrolled faces When I access the facial recognition settings And I want to manage the list of enrolled faces Then I should be able to add, edit, or remove faces from the system</s>

input: As a homeowner, I want my security system to use AI to analyze unusual activity patterns and alert me to potential threats.
output: Scrum User Story: AI-Powered Activity Pattern Analysis Description: As a homeowner, I want my security system to use AI to analyze unusual activity patterns and alert me to potential threats. This will provide proactive security by detecting suspicious behavior and notifying me promptly. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support AI-powered activity pattern analysis. The system should learn typical activity patterns and alert me to deviations. The alerts should be sent in real-time via the mobile app. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enabling AI Activity Pattern Analysis Given that I am a homeowner When I access the security system settings And I want to enable AI activity pattern analysis Then I should be able to activate the feature Scenario: Learning Typical Activity Patterns Given that AI activity pattern analysis is enabled When the security system observes and learns typical activity patterns Then it should establish a baseline for normal behavior Scenario: Alert for Deviations Given that AI activity pattern analysis is enabled When the system detects a deviation from the normal activity pattern Then it should send a real-time alert to my mobile app Scenario: Customizing Sensitivity Given that I am a homeowner with AI activity pattern analysis enabled When I access the system settings And I want to customize the sensitivity of the alerts Then I should be able to adjust the sensitivity level

input: As a business owner, I want AI integration with my commercial security system to recognize and categorize different types of security events.
output: Scrum User Story: AI-Based Event Recognition for Businesses Description: As a business owner, I want AI integration with my commercial security system to recognize and categorize different types of security events. This will help streamline security management by providing detailed event information. Acceptance Criteria: The commercial security system should support AI-based event recognition. It should categorize events such as intrusions, fire, and access control breaches. The system should provide event logs with timestamps and details. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enabling AI Event Recognition Given that I am a business owner When I access the commercial security system settings And I want to enable AI event recognition Then I should be able to activate the feature Scenario: Recognizing and Categorizing Events Given that AI event recognition is enabled When the security system detects an event Then it should categorize the event type, such as intrusion, fire, or access control breach Scenario: Event Log with Details Given that AI event recognition is enabled When I access the event logs And I want to view details of a specific event Then the system should provide a log entry with timestamps and event-specific details Scenario: Configuring Notification Preferences Given that I am a business owner with AI event recognition enabled When I access the notification settings And I want to configure notification preferences for specific event types Then I should be able to set up custom notifications for different event categories

This will help streamline security management by providing detailed event information. Acceptance Criteria: The commercial security system should support AI-based event recognition. It should categorize events such as intrusions, fire, and access control breaches. The system should provide event logs with timestamps and details. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enabling AI Event Recognition Given that I am a business owner When I access the commercial security system settings And I want to enable AI event recognition Then I should be able to activate the feature Scenario: Recognizing and Categorizing Events Given that AI event recognition is enabled When the security system detects an event Then it should categorize the event type, such as intrusion, fire, or access control breach Scenario: Event Log with Details Given that AI event recognition is enabled When I access the event logs And I want to view details of a specific event Then the system should provide a log entry with timestamps and event-specific details Scenario: Configuring Notification Preferences Given that I am a business owner with AI event recognition enabled When I access the notification settings And I want to configure notification preferences for specific event types Then I should be able to set up custom notifications for different event categories</s>

input: As a customer, I want AI integration with my security system to recognize and differentiate between real threats and false alarms.
output: Scrum User Story: AI-Based Threat Differentiation Description: As a customer, I want AI integration with my security system to recognize and differentiate between real threats and false alarms. This will reduce false alarm notifications and improve the system's reliability. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support AI-based threat differentiation. It should analyze security events to determine if they represent real threats. The system should minimize false alarms by providing accurate threat assessments. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enabling AI Threat Differentiation Given that I am a customer When I access the security system settings And I want to enable AI threat differentiation Then I should be able to activate the feature Scenario: Analyzing Security Events Given that AI threat differentiation is enabled When the security system detects a security event Then it should analyze the event data to determine if it represents a real threat Scenario: Accurate Threat Assessment Given that AI threat differentiation is enabled When the system assesses a security event as a potential threat Then it should trigger an alarm or notification only for genuine threats Scenario: Reducing False Alarms Given that AI threat differentiation is enabled When the system successfully differentiates between real threats and false alarms Then it should significantly reduce false alarm notifications

It should analyze security events to determine if they represent real threats. The system should minimize false alarms by providing accurate threat assessments. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enabling AI Threat Differentiation Given that I am a customer When I access the security system settings And I want to enable AI threat differentiation Then I should be able to activate the feature Scenario: Analyzing Security Events Given that AI threat differentiation is enabled When the security system detects a security event Then it should analyze the event data to determine if it represents a real threat Scenario: Accurate Threat Assessment Given that AI threat differentiation is enabled When the system assesses a security event as a potential threat Then it should trigger an alarm or notification only for genuine threats Scenario: Reducing False Alarms Given that AI threat differentiation is enabled When the system successfully differentiates between real threats and false alarms Then it should significantly reduce false alarm notifications</s>

input: As a homeowner, I want AI integration with my security system to provide predictive security insights based on historical data and patterns.
output: Scrum User Story: Predictive Security Insights with AI Description: As a homeowner, I want AI integration with my security system to provide predictive security insights based on historical data and patterns. This will help me proactively address potential security risks. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support AI-driven predictive security insights. It should analyze historical data and patterns to identify potential risks. The system should provide proactive recommendations to mitigate risks. input: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to detect and alert me to potential equipment malfunctions or failures.
output: Scrum User Story: AI-Based Equipment Malfunction Detection Description: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to detect and alert me to potential equipment malfunctions or failures. This will help ensure the reliability and performance of the security system. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support AI-based equipment malfunction detection. It should continuously monitor equipment health and performance. The system should provide real-time alerts if it detects potential malfunctions or failures. input: As a homeowner, I want my security system to use AI to optimize energy usage based on occupancy patterns.
output: Scrum User Story: AI-Optimized Energy Usage Description: As a homeowner, I want my security system to use AI to optimize energy usage based on occupancy patterns. input: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to provide automated package detection and delivery notifications.
output: Scrum User Story: Automated Package Detection and Delivery Notifications with AI Description: As a customer, I want my security system to use AI to provide automated package detection and delivery notifications. It should recognize package deliveries and trigger notifications to the customer. The system should provide package detection settings. input: As a homeowner, I want AI integration with my security system to provide predictive maintenance for smart home devices.
output: Scrum User Story: Predictive Maintenance for Smart Home Devices Description: As a homeowner, I want AI integration with my security system to provide predictive maintenance for smart home devices. This will help ensure that my smart home devices remain operational and reliable. Acceptance Criteria: The security system should support AI-based predictive maintenance for smart home devices. It should continuously monitor the health and performance of smart home devices. The system should provide proactive maintenance recommendations. Gherkin Scenarios: Scenario: Enabling AI Predictive Maintenance Given that I am a homeowner When I access the security system settings And I want to enable AI predictive maintenance for smart home devices Then I should be able to activate the feature Scenario: Continuous Device Monitoring Given that AI predictive maintenance is enabled When the system continuously monitors the health and performance of smart home devices Then it should detect potential issues or failures Scenario: Proactive Maintenance Recommendations Given that AI predictive maintenance is enabled When the system identifies a potential issue with smart home devices Then it should provide proactive maintenance recommendations to prevent failures Scenario: Scheduling and Tracking Maintenance Given that AI predictive maintenance is enabled When I receive maintenance recommendations from the system Then I should be able to schedule and track maintenance activities to address the identified issues
